Long Description: (charms, compulsions, phantasms, patterns, and morale effects)

Short Description: Uses its Charisma modifier for Concentration checks
+4 racial bonus on saves against poison

Long Description: Against attacks made or effects created by evil creatures, this ability provides a +4 deflection bonus to AC and a +4 resistance bonus on saving throws to anyone within 20 feet of the angel. Otherwise, it functions as a magic circle against evil effect and a lesser globe of invulnerability, both with a radius of 20 feet (caster level equals angel’s HD). (The defensive benefits from the circle are not included in an angel’s statistics block.)
